attributes.action: Pursuade the BBC to Bring back the Russell Brand show on radio 2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would be a platform for people who wish to counter the negative media frenzy and show support for a radio show which gives a great deal of entertainment to it's listeners.
Thanks....

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
